title: 4 Days Remain for 16K Bitcoin Price 4Chan Prophecy: Now Possible?
text:
4 Days Remain for 16K Bitcoin Price 4Chan Prophecy: Now Possible?

Cryptocurrency News 2 hours ago (Oct 27, 2019 06:01PM ET)

© Reuters. 4 Days Remain for 16K Bitcoin Price 4Chan Prophecy: Now Possible? price (BTC) has been a popular topic this week. After the monstrous run from $7,400 to over $10,500 on Oct. 25, it certainly looks as if last week's article indicating the early stages of a bullish reversal came to fruition. As usual, there has been wild speculation on Crypto Twitter that the Bitcoin price pump was a direct result of Chinese President Xi Jinping calling for an acceleration in the development of blockchain technology as reported by Cointelegraph last week. Continue Reading on Coin Telegraph
